control.label: [B]Before you Start[/B] it's recommended to do the following - [I](to improve performance)[/I]

control.control:
200 100% horizontal 10 center fo bonuce left/right instead 100 100
Animation_Item_Focus true diffuse/gradient_left.png diffuse/gradient_left.png 320 120 YES center font36_title RunScript(script.embuary.helper,action=toggleaddons,addonid=script.module.metadatautils+script.skin.helper.service+script.skin.helper.widgets+script.skin.helper.backgrounds,enable=false) RunScript(script.embuary.helper,action=setkodisetting,setting=videolibrary.tvshowsselectfirstunwatcheditem,value=1) SetFocus(103)
send click doesnt seem to work Animation_Item_Focus true diffuse/gradient_left.png diffuse/gradient_left.png 320 120 NO center font36_title SetFocus(103)

control.label: You can for sure enable them again via Addon Setting if you need to switch to another skin who use them as dependencie...
